name: Battle Dice (Zomk)
description:
Help Chip,  the worst casino chip, to rise to the top of the casino by battling other chips and slot machines with their own methods: A game of luck!

Battle Dice  is a turn based strategy game where your weapons are dice. You can hold up to 9 different dice from which you can use 3 per turn. You can steal the dice of your enemies when defeating them to make your victory even more tasty :)

If you want to get another dice while already holding 9 you can simply replace one of yours.

Have fun gambling and good luck ^^
